Udineze smenio Tudora! Gatuzo među petoricom kandidata za klupu…
Posle 11 primljenih golova u dve utakmice

01 Nov 2019

Do prošlog vikenda se Udineze dičio statusom najbolje odbrane u italijanskoj Seriji A. Sve je delovalo obećavajuće za hrvatskog stručnjaka Igora Tudora i njegove Zebre. Bili su na 10. mestu prvenstvene tabele, a sa samo šest primljenih golova u osam mečeva su bili najbolja odbrana lige…
A onda je brzi voz pregazio Udineze i Tudora!
Atalanta je deklasirala Zebre sa 7:1, a tri dana kasnije ih je Roma razbila na Friuliju sa 4:0 postigavši tri gola sa igračem manje. Bilo je očigledno da se sve raspalo u Udinezeu. Nešto je moralo da se menja.
Danas je promenjen trener. Igor Tudor je smenjen.
Hrvat je u martu došao kao “vatrogasac” na Friuli i pomogao Udinezeu da izbori opstanak. Sličan posao je obavio i u prvom mandatu na proleće 2018. godine, ali je na kraju sezone napustio klub jer se nije dogovorio sa čelnicima.
Udinezeu još ne gori pod nogama, prvenstvo je tek počelo, tri boda su iznad zone ispadanja… Ali da ne bi došli u situaciju kao prethodne dve sezone, u Friuliji su rešili da krizu seku u korenu i smenili trenera.
Ekipu će narednog vikenda na Marasiju prpotiv Đenove voditi dosadašnji pomoćnik Luka Goti, a očekuje se da do tada bude pronađen novi trener. Italijanski mediji barataju nekolicinom imena koja bi mogla da naslede Tudora. Najčešće se pominje bivši Milanov trener Đenaro Gatuzo, ali danas se sve jače govori i o povratku Frančeska Gvidolina koji je već u dva mandata proveo ukupno pet godina na klupi Udinezea. Šuška se i o rešenjima poput Ćezarea Prandelija, te povratku bivših trenera Stefana Kolantuona i Paskvalea Marina.
(FOTO: reuters)

Udinese replaced Tudor! Gatuzo among five bench candidates…
After 11 goals scored in two games

01 Nov 2019

Until last weekend, Udinese boasted the status of best defense in Italy's Serie A. Everything seemed promising for Croatian expert Igor Tudor and his Zebra. They were 10th in the championship standings, and with only six goals scored in eight matches they were the best defense of the league ...
And then a fast train overtook Udinese and Tudor!
Atalanta defeated the Zebra 7: 1, and three days later Roma smashed it at Friuli 4-0, scoring three goals with a player less. It was obvious that everything had fallen apart in Udinese. Something had to change.
Coach changed today. Igor Tudor was fired.
In March, the Croat came as a "firefighter" on Friuli and helped Udinese fight for survival. He did a similar job in his first term in the spring of 2018, but left the club at the end of the season because he did not agree with the leaders.
Udinese are still not under their feet, the championship has just begun, three points are above the relegation zone… But in order not to get into a situation like the previous two seasons, Friuli decided to crunch the ax and replace the coach.
The team will be headed by Geno's assistant Luka Gotti next weekend on Marasi to Genoa, and is expected to find a new coach by then. The Italian media has handled a few names that could succeed Tudor. Former Milan coach Genaro Gatuzo is most often mentioned, but today, the return of Francesco Guidolino, who has spent a total of five years on the Udinese bench in two terms, is growing. There are also rumors of solutions like Caesar Prandelli, and the return of former coaches Stefan Kolantuon and Pascvale Marin.
(PHOTO: reuters)
